name: _devGame
description:
You play as programmer fixing bugs in an unnamed game's game code.  Traverse the world in search of bugs to destroy.  Use your phone to learn and find upgrades to better understand the game's code and the knowledge needed to destroy all programming bugs in the game, before the game's launch date.

Created by Nicoli 

for BlackTornProd Gamejam 

Theme:-  Game Development...

Uploading my first build... Currently still under development
